entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
